name: The Monument
description:
Prologue:

Let Me Introduce Myself, My Name is "Chi-Merk" As the Alien Soldier.

The Balance of The World is Important, so I Must Investigating about The Statues at The Monument, Reveal The Mysteries About The Monument and The Creators.

I Won't Let You Down, Captain!

Game Content:

- More than 190 Items (Include Weapon, Armor, Hat, And Accessories).

- Teleporting, Crafting, Processing, Gathering, And More.

- More Minigames, and Hidden Places.

- More Interactive Objects in Arround You.

- Mystery of Monument Awaits You.
